Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll’s GitHub repo.

This is the page for Vectrabool, an image vectorization library done for Integrated Project at ENS Lyon. The website aims to be a mean for our group to have a spotlight and a way to present our project easier.
